description: A one-sided battle between the yaka ensues with Aono attacking while Matsuri runs for her life. But in the end, Aono cannot bring herself to kill Matsuri and leaves. After suffering another mental attack, Yorito is brought to Mana`s place to keep him safe from Aono who later comes looking for him; Mana manages to get her to leave. Meanwhile, the enfeebled Matsuri runs into Takeshi once again and this man still has an old promise to fulfill.
